root.name: Officers
root.description: Officers is a 3D Real Time Strategy game where the player acts as a military commander. Officers is also a a combat simulator that covers the entire span of World War II. A lot of work has been dedicated towards tactical and strategic aspects of war, so that the player will have to take care of real issues that affect officers in the military. From re-supplies to tactical manoeuvring and combat operations. Players get to choose which side of the war they wish to fight with, as well as what job (Infantry or Tanker) they wish to fulfil. The end objective is to occupy the enemies capital. All positions of forces at the start of the war are historically accurate. Global AI then takes care of control of the armies and sets current objectives to the player. the outcome of the war depends on the players choices as an officer as well as the players tactical skills.
